context: I love the sound of my Dunkin Doughnut Drone early in the morning!
Got a flyer in my mail.  Roof cleaning with a drone spraying shingles or tile.  Now that's progress.  There going to use drones to spray for mosquitoes.  Genius.
I guess the fact that they don't mention the cost of the delivery means it is significant. That would have been an interesting detail.
the USA is 'over'.  drones will not save your disunited states.

replies.context: And if the USA is over the whole world goes with it, Dear Comrade.

context: Oh nice a $3000 China drone To drop food off to People hiding from China Virus! Paid for by the American tax payer no doubt by use of tax write off! Nothing like paying China for Killing Americans!

replies.context: Need a drone to drop off your meds?

context: They're gonna need a lot of expensive batteries ....
All I hear is someone yelling.......   Pull !

replies.context: Shoot a drone, go to jail.
Prove who shot it. No cameras on the drone.
Not over my property...    Try again

The Federal Aviation Administration [has] confirmed that shooting down a drone is a federal crime and cited The Aircraft Sabotage Act, 18 USC 32, a statute that makes it a felony to damage or destroy any aircraft, manned or unmanned.
It is just as illegal to shoot at a drone over your property as it is to shoot at an airplane or helicopter flying over.
Like I said, shoot a drone, go to jail. My company uses drones. Not consumer grade drones that cost a couple of hundred dollars. Professional equipment that costs thousands. If anybody, including you, took a shot at one of my drones, you better believe I'm pressing charges.
Like I said >>>>     Pull !          try lightening up a little bit Skippy

context: 6.6 pounds capacity?  So it can't even deliver a gallon of water?
The drone will release the package/breakfast, once it senses you have gotten out of the shower.

American Exceptionalism on display.  Something gets in your way, find a way around it.

This is why there are the haves and have nots (ruling out lottery winners and inheritances).  People with motivation will always find away.  Lazy slackers (R and D) will feed off the freebies as long as they are given out.
